author: FARA-Assistant
name: CookieManager
description: Owner-only cog that logs into MissionChief, stores encrypted credentials/cookies locally, exposes aiohttp session to other cogs, and auto-refreshes with smarter validation.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores credentials and website cookies locally on your machine (Raspberry Pi). Credentials and cookies are encrypted with a locally stored key. No data is sent to third parties.
